plot: The erotic thriller that will hold you absolutely spellbound...PoundIn PleasureTwo strangers meet. But one of them has a secret yet to be shared...BoundIn DarknessNow the real games are about to begin..."Darkness Bound"The Thriller Everyone Will Be Reading.The Thriller Everyone Will Be Talking About.The Thriller That Taps Into A Deep Well Of Erotic Obsession, Sexual Betrayal, Madness And Murder.The Thriller That Goes All The Way..."Darkness Bound"
